mapper.select:
SELECT SCRAP_ID, BOARD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, SCRAP_REGISTER_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, SCRAP_ID, BOARD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, SCRAP_REGISTER_DATE FROM ( SELECT SCRAP_ID, B.BOARD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, SCRAP_REGISTER_DATE FROM TABLE_SCRAP S JOIN TBL_BOARD B ON S.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID WHERE S.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY SCRAP_ID DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * 10 ) WHERE R > (#{page}-1) * 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SCRAP(SCRAP_ID, USER_ID, BOARD_ID) VALUES (SEQ_SCRAP.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{boardId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_SCRAP WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
